Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Relates to the Cayuga county jail
Summary: Authorizes the Cayuga county jail to be used for the detention of persons under arrest being held for arraignment in any court located in the county of Cayuga.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to authorizing the Cayuga county jail to also be used for the detention of persons under arrest being held for arraignment in any court located in the county of Cayuga
